professionalSummary: Results-oriented professional with over 5 years of experience in IT project management. Proven track record of successfully leading teams to deliver projects on time and within budget.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science

responsibilities: Led a cross-functional team of 10 members in the successful implementation of a critical software upgrade, resulting in a 20% increase in system efficiency.
Managed project budgets totaling $2 million, ensuring optimal resource allocation and cost control.
Collaborated with stakeholders to define project scope, objectives, and deliverables.
Assisted in the planning and execution of various IT projects, ensuring adherence to timelines and quality standards.
Facilitated communication between development teams and clients, addressing concerns and ensuring client satisfaction.
Prepared and maintained project documentation, including project plans, status reports, and risk assessments.
